content: Thanks for this, Alexainie . You start with your car crash and sobriety, but don’t carry the metaphor forward. I feel like this whole election cycle was a car crash (or a train wreck). It seems people never change their ways until disaster smacks them over the head with a shovel (or a biblical flood, something we can now look forward to more of). If your crash was what it took to change your course, I hope that this wreck sobers America.
